track.name: Wordplay
comments: Wow, thanks "train radio" for this..i forgot about this song and this is my 1st listen on the scrobble, yay!  This and The Remedy is my favorite!
<3 <3 Yes, you've got my attention.  Again.
One of the truly good Jason Mraz songs. :)
may just be my favorite song by him. :) [2]
may just be my favorite song by him. :)

“ PLEASE DON'T READ THIS. YOU WILL BE KISSED ON THE NEAREST POSSIBLE FRIDAY BY THE LOVE OF YOUR LIFE.TOMORROW WILL BE THE BEST DAY OF YOUR LIFE. NOW YOU'VE STARTED READING THIS. DON'T STOP. THIS IS SO FREAKY. 1. say your name 10 times 2. say your mom's name 5 times 3. say your crushes name 3 times 4. paste this to 4 other songs. if you do this, your crush will kiss you on the nearest Friday. but if you read this and do not paste this, then you will have very bad luck. SEND THIS TO 5 SONGS IN 143 MINUTES. WHEN YOU'RE DONE PRESS F6 AND YOUR CRUSH'S NAME WILL APPEAR IN BIG LETTERS ON THE SCREEN. THIS IS SO FREAKY BECAUSE IT ACTUALLY WORK ”
It's all about the wordplay, and it's some great play on words. <3
let me introduce you to my style...
If anyone's curious: it reminds me of either Testing 1,2,3 or Falling for the First Time. I don't remember exactly.
When he starts humming and all like ah-lalala it reminds me of some Barenaked Ladies song but I honestly forget which. I have to figure that out. But great song. Best song by him for a long while.
